purpose: The email announces a tenure-track position for an Associate Senior Lecturer in AI for Software Engineering at Blekinge Institute of Technology.
evidence_sentences: Blekinge Institute of Technology is an internationally top-ranked research environment in empirical software engineering.
The employment includes research, teaching, and supervision in software engineering.
The focus of the research will be on using and developing (generative) AI to improve software development processes as well as the quality of software artefacts.
The teaching includes lectures, practical elements, and course development at undergraduate and graduate levels in software engineering.
Initially, the proportion of research is guaranteed to be at least 60% of the employment.
